subject: Football
Cheating
lead_paragraph: Theodore V. Wells Jr., who led the investigation into the case of the Patriots’ deflated footballs, was a lineman at Holy Cross and earned his reputation as a lawyer in public corruption and insider trading cases.
snippet: Theodore V. Wells Jr., who led the investigation into the case of the Patriots’ deflated footballs, was a lineman at Holy Cross and earned his reputation as a lawyer in public corruption and insider trading cases.
